creator: Jim.Myers@pnl.gov
text:
The definition of STRING in Client.g requires them to be at least two 
characters long and excludes the '_' char (among others) in quoted strings. 
There's a TODO note to make STRING more flexible, but until that's done, it 
would be useful for me to have the noted restrictions lifted. Here's a patch:

1129c1129
<     :   CHARS (CHARS | '-')+
---
>     :   CHARS (CHARS | '-')*
1133a1134
>         |   '_'

creator: Jim.Myers@pnl.gov
text: *** Bug 27714 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 27779 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
